dt: {bc}to instruct and improve especially in moral and religious knowledge {bc}{sx|uplift||}

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}edifier{/it}, from Late Latin & Latin; Late Latin {it}aedificare{/it} to instruct or improve spiritually, from Latin, to erect a house, from {it}aedes{/it} temple, house; akin to Old English {it}ād{/it} funeral pyre, Latin {it}aestas{/it} summer
shortdef: to instruct and improve especially in moral and religious knowledge : uplift; also : enlighten, inform
